title: Urgot deserves the Victorious skin this year.
body:
You know he does, Riot.

You know he does.

http://i.imgur.com/M0UZY6n.png

replies.body: They give them to champions that were played a lot so probably Zed
and then Bjerg joined the cult of Urgod
Urgot is a strong pick in the LCS right now, and Zed actually shows up *less than he does*.
Victorious is for Solo Queue however, not lcs

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=skngtxEn,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2015-04-09T13:39:56.289+0000)
>
> Victorious is for Solo Queue however, not lcs

his win rate went from 41% to 48%

how is that not a win?

His pickrate still hovers between 0.9 - 1.4%

Viky skins are usually given to champions who are very popular throughout the whole season and who caused a huge shift in the meta.

Urgot did open up the golden age of diversity in lcs, with his champions of the forgotten,  but he simply isnt popular in yolo queue still.

Will this change? Maybe. If it does, he will be a candidate.

You're probably right, I was just pointing out how Urgot is actually more popular in competitive than Zed at the moment.

If I had to choose a champ for a victorious skin, I'd probably say either {{champion:113}}, {{champion:120}}, or maybe {{champion:14}}.
If it is going to be Sejuani I need to get into gold RIGHT NOW.
PLS
Sion REALLY could use a new skin...I'd be all for a victorious skin for him.
The upcomming Black Cleaver changes seem to go right into Urgot's Alley, considering it's already a core item on him, that should give him another boost.
I think everyone is forgetting about {{champion:127}}
yeah, because they nerfed her and she completely fell out of the meta and only really had an impact in the front end of preseason and the spring split.
looks like an obese version of Bubbles from powder puff girls
I was thinking DeeDee from Dexter's Lab.
or instead...URFgot: a mecha-manatee who shoots homing spatulas is FAR better than some blue-chrome/gold-chrome version of itself

THIS.FUCKING.POST.
If only I could upvote more than once
of all the ugly urgot skins i have seen, this is probably the one that makes me most unfomfortable xD
What has been seen cannot be unseen.
{{champion:238}} The unseen belly, is the deadliest

There are some candidates for Victorious Skin this year by far, but I will wait until July/August or so... even at September/October:

{{champion:6}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:42}} 

we'll see... because I think Victorious Skin is a skin for the Champion who make impact throughout a season year... or season meta...

The Victorious Skin Award goes to...
I wouldn't be surprised at all if it turned out to be victorious graves.
Yeah, my money's on shot-gun guy
He was a swindler at first, so maybe rethink that.

Unless Kat starts showing up in every LCS match starting from now until Worlds (lol let's be honest here, if she showed up in one match she'd get squashed into a 36% win rate), there's no way she's a candidate. Same for Vlad.
Actually she showed up in one match and dominated the game. And this was AFTER her health nerfs.
i thought victorious was for solo q impact mainly and championship was for lcs, but idk im probably wrong here

But I can see {{champion:238}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:68}} as top contenders across both EU and NA.

i honestly vote for nautilus or urgot

thing being, whats constantly being played as, and people haven't whined about?
That looks more like Arcade Urgot
wow so sexy

Victorious skin? Yes. 

Gender-bender Annie-got with rainbows, tiny breasts and a gigantic belly, though? That's just a little frightening.
cannot unsee {{summoner:14}} {{item:2050}} {{item:2050}} {{summoner:14}}

I'd earn it, and feel like a *champion.*
All praise Urgot.

"what's this thread about?"
see picture
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KuuktJh6c8I/T7yUjp9e_aI/AAAAAAAABOY/sLHmTr9Mwdc/s1600/misfits.gif

Agreed. But crabgot will always be better.

inb4 Riot changes the splash art because of transparent wet shirt showing girl's ass. kek
These heathens don't even know how to spell Urgod

yes urgot always shows up if he is halfway decent and riot doesnt mega nerf him

cause he is a god

just for this he deserves this skin
Isnt that Arcade Urgot?
I actualy think it will be a tie between  {{champion:117}} or {{champion:14}} and {{champion:57}}
Ezreal
Or maybe Arcade Urgot ;P

My eyes, they burn!

I think that's enough internet for today. *gets up and walks away from keyboard shivering*
Honestly, if it's a popularity contest, it currently looks like Sejuani would be a likely candidate, if they don't go with one of the standard near-100% bans.
